feature1.explanation: Both texts use parentheses, quotation marks, and commas for punctuation. Text 1 includes hyphens and colons, while Text 2 uses brackets. Overall, there is some overlap in punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts display a similar level of lexical variation and word choice. Grammatical categories and part of speech usage are consistent across both texts.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts exhibit similar complexity and coherence. They share comparable lengths and arrangements of sentences.

feature4.explanation: In terms of text and discourse features, both texts convey a similar tone and mood. They use common expressions and idioms, reflecting a consistent narrative style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were identified in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
